description: MainActivity class implementing the UI and logic for a Tic Tac Toe game in an Android application. Handles user interactions, game state, AI moves, score tracking, and UI updates.

classes.name: MainActivity.Player
classes.description: Enum representing players: X and O

classes.name: MainActivity.GameMode
classes.description: Enum representing game modes: LOCAL and AI

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes UI components, sets up event listeners, and resets the game.

methods.name: onCellClicked
methods.description: Handles user clicks on a cell, updates game state, triggers AI move if applicable.

methods.name: updateBoardUI
methods.description: Updates the game board UI to reflect current game state.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state without resetting scores.

methods.name: endGame
methods.description: Ends the game and displays the result.

methods.name: isDraw
methods.description: Checks if the game is a draw.

methods.name: checkWin
methods.description: Checks if a specific player has won.

methods.name: getAIMove
methods.description: Determines the AI's move, with basic logic to win or block.

methods.name: updateStatus
methods.description: Updates the UI to show which player's turn it is.

methods.name: playerName
methods.description: Returns the display name for a player.
